title: The Macra Terror
dialogue_triumphs: You can't arrest us now we've given ourselves up!
Bad laws were made to be broken
dialogue_disasters: The colony is in the hands of grotesque insects!
goofs: When Medok is called to provide the Doctor's alibi, the Doctor tells the Pilot not to believe everything that Medok is going to say.
Chicki is played by different actresses in episodes one and four.

continuity_notes.name: Macra
continuity_notes.description: Large crab-like creatures that depend on a specific type of gas for survival.
continuity_notes.current_status: Controlling the colony through manipulation and fear.

continuity_notes.name: Jamie
continuity_notes.description: A companion of the Second Doctor, known for his Scottish heritage.
continuity_notes.current_status: Performs the Highland Fling to avoid pursuers.

locations.name: The Colony
locations.description: A human settlement on an unnamed planet, controlled by the Macra.
locations.current_status: Under the control of the Macra

future_history: The ancestors of the colony came from Earth many centuries ago, and they retain the title of 'Pilot' for their leader.
additional_notes: The episode features various machines for grooming and muscle-toning. The Doctor's reaction to these provides some comedic moments.
bottom_line: A flawed but interesting examination of a peculiarly 60s psychosis.
